signature: <K, V> IterableMap<K, V> transformedMap(Map<K, V>, Transformer<? super K, ? extends K>, Transformer<? super V, ? extends V>)

enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before transforming maps to ensure consistent state.
Transformers need to be initialized before they can be used in the transformation process.
Verifying the transformation results can help ensure the correctness of the transformed map.
Comparing the transformed map with an expected result can validate the transformation process.
